title: Free Webinar — Understanding structured concurrency in Kotlin Coroutines
author: Halina Kt Academy

html:
Hello Kotliners,

Marcin Moskala’s Kotlin Coroutines: Deep Dive book helped thousands of developers write better asynchronous code. Now, he’s hosting a free live webinar to break down structured concurrency with clear examples — showing both the best practices and the most common pitfalls.

What you’ll get:

✅ A deep understanding of coroutine structure

⚠️ An in-depth look at the most common mistakes and how to avoid them

💡 Real-world examples you can apply right away

Already confident with coroutines? That’s great. But if you’ve ever struggled with coroutine structure, or just want a solid refresher, this webinar is for you.

It’s interactive — feel free to bring your questions and ask them live.

📅 June 12

🕛 Two sessions to fit your time zone

Want to join? Tap the image below or click here to sign up.
